item.description:
I have heard lots of good things about the Hawthorne Inn, but have never had a chance to eat there. Let's go!! I CHANGED THIS TO A LIMIT OF 9 PEOPLE, as there was not much interest. NO DEPOSIT is needed, so if you paid one, I will refund you. We will eat in the main dining room.

They have a nice pre-fix menu for $20.09, or you can order off the menu. A bottle of house wine is only $18.00. For more info see their website: http://www.hawthorne-...
Quite a nice little write-up of their history in the "about us" tab.

Reservation is under "BETSY"

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: HAWTHORNE INN 01/20/09 7:00PM
